Articles.Content:
How hard can it be to make a sphere anyway? ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**The Death Star**

1191 parts. 186.4 tons. Not as big as I would have liked but anything bigger probably wouldn't have been very practical.

![CHhAvWc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CHhAvWc.jpg)

![gdlZeSF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/gdlZeSF.jpg)

![6y1uxLI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6y1uxLI.jpg)

It's quite roomy inside. There's a docking port on the south pole so you can transfer Kerbals inside where they are safe to EVA without floating out into space.

![kFuVfJQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/kFuVfJQ.jpg)

![4WTZO2o.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/4WTZO2o.jpg)

![Mdz6DCr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Mdz6DCr.jpg)

![BEEfNO8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BEEfNO8.jpg)

![6nvxpZa.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6nvxpZa.jpg)

![2KwltOh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2KwltOh.jpg)

"You came out of Lightspeed too close to the planet!"

![O6fRiw9.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/O6fRiw9.jpg)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/1Ujob)

[Download here!](http://www./download/xu08kaum35575hf/Death_Star.craft)

"We got Death Star! (Death Star!)

We got Death Star! (Death Star!)

We got Death Star! (Death Star!)"

Woah.

Does it shoot things? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Woah.
> Does it shoot things? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Sadly not, unless there is some kind of super laser mod out there. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> anything bigger probably wouldn't have been very practical.

Ha I love it!

> 
> Sadly not, unless there is some kind of super laser mod out there. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

BD armory. DO IT! BLOW UP KERBIN! also i would suggest to weld it for the BD armory because it will get heavier

[http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220271-lazor-system](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220271-lazor-system)

It's called the "Sunbeam" laser or something. (Out of the several lasers there. The rest of them don't actually destroy things)

Skip to 1:30 to see it in action.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CwiUbsq2q58?start=90&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Now you need proton torpedoes, for science!

> 
> [http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220271-lazor-system](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220271-lazor-system)
> It's called the "Sunbeam" laser or something. (Out of the several lasers there. The rest of them don't actually destroy things)
> 
> Skip to 1:30 to see it in action.

Woah, I'd seen that video before but I didn't know you could download some of that stuff. Might be a challenge.

Where is the tunnel where I pilot my X-wing through?

Only joking.

I don't have an X-wing.
This thing is so awesome!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):D

My only thoughts:

"Dafu--?"

GJ Redshift!

Any small exhaust vents? 

Awesome job!

I think it's missing something...

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4uhzR53NgTA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

No tunnels or exhaust ports!

I used Editor Extension for this and crucially Part Angle display. Without Part Angle Display it would have been impossible. BTW, if you don't like the internals I made you can rip them out. The main structure wasn't built around them.
Outstanding looks man! Good thing there's no Kalderaan in this star system!

Hey please can you update the download links. It seems that they aren't working anymore.

Please I badly want them !

I think it needs these:

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/132849-mini-star-destroyer/&do=embed&embedComment=2427554&embedDo=findComment#comment-2427554"></iframe>

It's an old file, but it checks out.

[https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9mK0rPybNaxa211TjI3cmFPd00](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9mK0rPybNaxa211TjI3cmFPd00)

![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
You inspired me to build a 1900 part model of the Enterprise from Star Trek.
